user.title: Config for WiCAN Integration
user.description: Enter the IP-Address for your WiCAN device. The IP-Address should be static or fixed in your router to avoid connection issues. Please also make sure your protocol is also set to 'auto_pid'. If you need help setting it up, you can find it here: https://github.com/jay-oswald/ha-wican
